Text.Name: Fat
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.0.Desc: Looks extremely skinny. Movement Speed is increased significantly.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.1.Desc: Looks a bit skinny. Movement Speed is increased slightly.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.3.Desc: Looks like some pounds are getting packed on. Max Qi has increased slightly, but Movement Speed has also decreased.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.4.Desc: Looks like obesity has set in. Max Qi has increased significantly, but Movement Speed has also decreased significantly.

Text.Name: Stronger
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.0.Desc: Skin and bones, muscle is hard to find, but Spell Cooldown has decreased significantly.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.1.Desc: There's not a lot of muscle on those bones, but Spell Cooldown has decreased slightly as a result.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.2.Desc: Not strong, but not bony either.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.3.Desc: Looks to be in good shape, Internal Core has benefitted slightly.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.4.Desc: Looks extremely healthy, with good physique. Internal Core has benefitted significantly.

Text.Name: Justice
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.0.Desc: Major Curse: Significantly decreases Barrier Power, while significantly increasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.1.Desc: Moderate Curse: Slightly decreases Barrier Power, while slightly increasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.2.Desc: Doesn't appear to be noticeably blessed or cursed.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.3.Desc: Slightly blessed. Barrier Power increases slightly, while Spell strength and Internal Core Attack strength decrease.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.4.Desc: As blessed as can be. Barrier Power increases significantly, while Spell strength and Internal Core Attack strength decrease significantly.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.0.Desc: Major Curse: Significantly decreases Barrier Power, while significantly increasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power. Significantly increases food and water consumption rates, while significantly decreasing nutrition absorption rate.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.1.Desc: Major Curse: Slightly decreases Barrier Power, while slightly increasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power. Increases food and water consumption rates, while decreasing nutrition absorption rate.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.4.Desc: Moderate Blessing: Slightly increases Barrier Power, while decreasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power. Decreases food and water consumption rates, while increasing nutrition absorption rate.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.5.Desc: Major Blessing: Significantly increases Barrier Power, while significantly decreasing Spell Power and Core Attack Power. Significantly decreases food and water consumption rates, while significantly increasing nutrition absorption rate.

Text.Name: NeiDan
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.2.SpecialAbility.0.Desc: When attacking the enemy's body itself, there is a 1% chance of dealing additional damage equal to 30% of the current target's Qi.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.2.SpecialAbility.0.Desc: Every 9th attack will cast a spell at the target enemy.

Text.Name: GrowPercent
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.0.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a dragon.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.1.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a phoenix.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.2.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a fox.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.0.Desc: Possesses a small portion of the full power of a canine.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.1.Desc: Possesses a portion of the full power of a canine.
Text.RaceExtra.3.Lv.2.Desc: Possesses the fully awakened power of a canine.
